\sphinxAtStartPar
Given any number of kwargs in the form:
\sphinxhyphen{} input is in the form:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n}{team\PYGZus{}name\PYGZus{}\PYGZus{}eq}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Italy}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}

\sphinxAtStartPar

\sphinxAtStartPar

right the value od the key of the corresponding kwargs value.

\sphinxAtStartPar
